channel.title: Run.bat error goudant V4
channel.description:

it has nothing to do with my JDK version i changed it :( any ideas ? O.o

item.title: Run.bat error goudant V4
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

You are trying to constructor an NPC object without providing arguments. You can either create an empty constructor (not recommended) or construct it properly.

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat error goudant V4
item.dc:creator: @RUNE-PK RUNE-PK
item.description:
@RUNE-PK wrote:

Did you try and edit it cause I downloaded it to see what the hell is going on and it worked fine?

Read full topic
